attributes.action: The Conservative Party should be officially renamed to 'The self-serving Party'
attributes.additional_details:
Over the months that the Conservative Party has been in power their intentions have become quite clear: privatise everything, help the rich get richer and screw everybody else.

In the interests of fair advertising I would like the Conservative Party to be renamed to reflect the tone of their policies and be officially called ' The self-serving Party' (or variations thereof) so that the general public will be more aware of who they are voting for in the future.
